text: Niphadoses dengcaolites is a moth in the family Crambidae. It was described by Wang and Sung in 1978. It is found in China (Jiangsu, Hubei, Jiangxi, Hunan, Sichuan). The forewings are pale yellow, suffused with fuscous scales along the costal area. There is a dark fuscous patch at the lower angle of the cell. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1978 Category:Schoenobiinae
title: Niphadoses dengcaolites
